amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide prescription drug coverage for all Medicare beneficiaries, enhance Medicare+Choice plans, include payments for oncology providers and related cancer drug therapy programs; improve rural health delivery; and implement various provisions dealing with Medicare Parts A and B, Medicaid, regulatory reduction and the reimportation of prescription drugs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in House Report 108-181 to insert a complete new text.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rangel amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 255, 1 Present (Roll no. 330).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) and on the bill pursuant to the rule.
Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Rangel.
